property.name: include
property.value: Map:Common Data

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 雪町

property.name: description
property.value: A locked door. It only unlocks after [[SAVE#Reset|resetting]] from the end of the [[True Pacifist Route]] if the protagonist had not touched any of the names in the [[True Pacifist Ending Credits]]. [[Glyde]] can be fought in this room.

property.name: page
property.value: Mysterious Door

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 一扇上鎖的門。只有在[[完美路線]]結尾中未碰到[[完美路線致謝名單]]中的任何名字時才會解鎖。可以在這個房間與 [[Glyde]] 戰鬥。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 神秘的門

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 神秘的門

property.name: description
property.value: Town situated at the end of [[Snowdin Forest]]. On the [[Genocide Route]], the town is abandoned after all of the inhabitants had evacuated.

properties.property: 位於[[雪町森林]]盡頭的城鎮。 在[[屠殺路線]]中不會出現 NPC。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 雪町鎮

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町鎮

property.name: description
property.value: Papyrus and Sans's house, accessible after Papyrus unlocks the front door. The date/hangout with Papyrus occurs here.

property.name: page
property.value: Papyrus and Sans's House

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 在和 Papyrus 戰鬥後解鎖前門後可進入。可以在此和 Papyrus 約會或是一同出去玩。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: Papyrus 和 Sans 的家

property.name: zh_page
property.value: Papyrus 和 Sans 的家

property.name: description
property.value: A restaurant. A hangout with [[Sans]] occurs here only if [[Papyrus]] was spared on the [[Neutral Route]].

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 一間酒吧。當[[中立路線]]中寬恕 [[Papyrus]] 後可以在此與 [[Sans]] 進行活動。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 雪町鎮圖書館入口

property.name: description
property.value: Only available on the console versions of [[Undertale]]. The shrine is accessible by entering through the sink in [[Papyrus]]'s kitchen. Each console version has a different iteration of the Dog Shrine.

property.name: page
property.value: Dog Shrine

properties.property: 僅在[[版本差異|遊戲機版本]]的 ''[[Undertale]]'' 中。該神社可透過進入[[Papyrus]] 廚房水槽來抵達。 每個主機版本都有不同版本的狗狗神社。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 狗狗神社

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 狗狗神社

property.name: description
property.value: If the [[Fun Value]] is between 40 and 45, [[Sans]] calls the protagonist and asks if their fridge is running. If the value is between 46 and 50, [[Alphys]] calls instead and attempts to order pizza.

properties.property: 當 [[Fun 值]]為40~50時會有機率接到電話。 當 Fun 值為40~45時 [[Sans]] 會打電話問冰箱是否在運轉。 當 Fun 值為45~50時 [[Alphys]]會打電話訂購披薩。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: Fun 值電話區

property.name: description
property.value: If the Fun Value is between 2 and 39, the protagonist receives a phone call addressed to someone whose name starts with the letter "G". The caller realizes that they called the wrong number and plays the Wrong Number Song.

property.name: page
property.value: Fun Value#Wrong Number Song

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 當 [[Fun 值]]為2~39時會有機率接到電話。某個打給某位名字以字母"G"開頭的人。來電者發現打錯號碼後，會播放"錯誤號碼之歌"。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 錯誤號碼之歌

property.name: zh_page
property.value: Fun 值#錯誤號碼之歌

property.name: description
property.value: The door to the Ruins. It remains locked throughout the game, but it unlocks at the end of the [[True Pacifist Route]].

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 通往廢墟的大門，僅在[[完美路線]]的結尾中可回去。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 廢墟

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 廢墟

property.name: description
property.value: A camera hidden in the bushes.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 隱藏在草叢內的攝影機。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 隱藏相機

property.name: description
property.value: [[Sans]] makes his introduction here and guides the protagonist to the conveniently-shaped lamp to hide from his brother [[Papyrus]].

properties.property: [[Sans]] 在這裡首次登場，並引導主角躲進一盞造型方便的檯燈後，以避開他的兄弟 [[Papyrus]]。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 第一次遇見 Sans

property.name: description
property.value: [[Papyrus]] makes his first appearance here. He complains that Sans is not doing his job properly, to which Sans responds by making jokes. On the [[Genocide Route]], Papyrus simply asks if Sans has found a human yet and quickly leaves afterwards.

properties.property: [[Papyrus]]在這裡首次登場。他抱怨 [[Sans]] 沒有好好執行工作，而 Sans 則以冷笑話作為回應。 在[[屠殺路線]]中，Papyrus 在問 Sans 是否找到人類後便迅速離開。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 第一次遇見 Papyrus

property.name: description
property.value: A camera hidden behind [[Sans]]'s sentry station.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 隱藏在草叢內的攝影機。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 隱藏相機

property.name: description
property.value: If the Fun Value is set to 65, there is a 50% chance that the Sound Test room will appear in between these two rooms after defeating [[Papyrus]]. The protagonist must select Gaster's Theme from the list of options in order to leave.

property.name: page
property.value: Fun Value#Sound Test Room

properties.property: 當 [[Fun 值]]為65並已經擊敗 [[Papyrus]] 後會有50%機率進入。 主角必須從選項中選擇"Gaster 的主題曲"才能離開。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 聲音測試房

property.name: zh_page
property.value: Fun 值#聲音測試房

property.name: description
property.value: The protagonist's first meeting with [[Papyrus]]. Papyrus declares his desire to capture the protagonist and retreats to prepare his puzzles.

properties.property: 主角首次與 [[Papyrus]] 見面。Papyrus 宣稱他想要抓住主角，並退場準備他的謎題。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: Papyrus 第一次遭遇

property.name: description
property.value: A camera hidden behind [[Papyrus]]'s sentry station.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 隱藏在 [[Papyrus]] 的厚紙板哨站內的攝影機。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 隱藏相機

property.name: description
property.value: [[Papyrus]] introduces the protagonist to the Invisible Electricity Maze. He is initially shocked by his own orb, and [[Sans]] reminds him that the human has to hold it in order for the puzzle to work as intended. On the [[Genocide Route]], the protagonist walks through the puzzle, much to Papyrus's confusion and annoyance.

properties.property: [[Papyrus]] 向主角介紹"隱形電擊迷宮"。他一開始被自己的球體給電到，而 [[Sans]] 提醒他必須讓人類拿著球體，謎題才會如預期運作。 在[[屠殺路線]]中，主角會直接穿過迷宮，令 Papyrus 感到困惑又惱怒。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 第二次遭遇 Papyrus

property.name: description
property.value: A camera hidden in the lump of snow.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 隱藏在雪堆內的攝影機。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 隱藏相機

property.name: description
property.value: [[Papyrus]] introduces a puzzle that [[Sans]] had created. After viewing or skipping the puzzle, Sans mentions that he should have used a crossword instead, to which Papyrus responds by saying that Junior Jumble is harder. Papyrus asks the protagonist whether crosswords or Junior Jumble is harder.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: [[Papyrus]] 介紹了一個由 [[Sans]] 設計的謎題。在觀看或略過該謎題後，Sans 表示他本來應該用填字遊戲取代，Papyrus 則回應說縱恆字謎更難。Papyrus 接著詢問主角覺得"填字遊戲"還是"縱恆字謎"比較難。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 第三次遭遇 Papyrus

property.name: description
property.value: A camera hidden inside the tree.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 隱藏在樹木內的攝影機。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 隱藏相機

property.name: description
property.value: [[Papyrus]] asks the protagonist what they did with the spaghetti in Snowdin's Spaghetti room. The protagonist can respond by saying they either ate it all or left it alone.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: [[Papyrus]] 詢問主角是否吃掉義大利麵，或是根本沒動它。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 第四次遭遇 Papyrus

property.name: description
property.value: [[Papyrus]] introduces the [[Multicolor Tile Puzzle]] and explains the functionalities of each tile color. On the [[Genocide Route]] the protagonist cuts off Papyrus's explanation by walking through the puzzle.

properties.property: [[Papyrus]] 介紹了[[彩色磚塊謎題]]，並說明每種顏色的功能。 在[[屠殺路線]]中主角會直接走過謎題，打斷了 Papyrus 的說明。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 第五次遭遇 Papyrus

property.name: description
property.value: [[Lesser Dog]]'s dog sculptures. How many are present depends on how many times Lesser Dog has been pet during its battle. If Lesser Dog was killed, all that remains is a pile of mushy snow.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: [[Lesser Dog]] 的雪雕藝術。出現的數量取決於在與 Lesser Dog 戰鬥時被撫摸了多少次。如果 Lesser Dog 被殺死，現場只會剩下一堆鬆軟的雪。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 雪狗

property.name: description
property.value: A camera hidden under the bridge.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 隱藏在橋下內的攝影機。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 隱藏相機

property.name: description
property.value: A camera hidden under the bridge.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 隱藏在橋下內的攝影機。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 隱藏相機

property.name: description
property.value: [[Papyrus]] introduces the [[Snowdin/Puzzles#The Gauntlet of Deadly Terror|Gauntlet of Deadly Terror]], but he quickly retracts it after realizing that it may be too dangerous for the protagonist or, on the [[Genocide Route]], that they might not enjoy it as much as [[Undyne]] would.

properties.property: [[Papyrus]]介紹了[[雪町/謎題#終極恐懼大考驗|終極恐懼大考驗]]，但很快就收回了這個提案，因為他意識到這對主角來說可能太危險了。 在[[屠殺路線]]中，他則覺得主角可能不會像 [[Undyne]] 那樣享受這個關卡。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 第六次遭遇 Papyrus

property.name: description
property.value: A camera hidden behind [[Lesser Dog]]'s sentry station.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 隱藏在 [[Lesser Dog]] 的哨站內的攝影機。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 隱藏相機

property.name: description
property.value: A camera hidden in the trees.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 隱藏在樹叢內的攝影機。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 隱藏相機

property.name: description
property.value: The protagonist can sleep at the inn and restore their HP beyond their maximum. The money they spend here is immediately refunded.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 主角可以在旅館睡覺，並將 [[遊戲數據#HP|HP]] 恢復至超過最大值。所花費的金錢會立即退還。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 旅館

property.name: description
property.value: An igloo network that warps the protagonist to the other side of town.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 可快速往返整個[[雪町鎮]]。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 地下雪屋隧道

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 地下雪屋隧道

property.name: description
property.value: The protagonist is taken here if they lose to [[Papyrus]].

property.name: page
property.value: Papyrus and Sans's House#Papyrus's Toolshed

properties.property: 若主角在與 [[Papyrus]] 的戰鬥中失敗，便會被帶到這裡。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: Papyrus 的棚子

property.name: zh_page
property.value: Papyrus_和_Sans_的家#Papyrus_的棚子

property.name: description
property.value: [[Papyrus]] initiates the date/hangout with him in his room.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: [[Papyrus]] 在他的房間裡主動發起與主角的約會或是出去玩活動。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 和 Papyrus 成為朋友

property.name: description
property.value: On the PlayStation versions of [[Undertale]], the protagonist can donate to upgrade the [[Dog Shrine]].

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 僅出現在 [[版本差異|PlayStation 版本]]的 ''[[Undertale]]'' 中，主角可以捐款來升級[[狗狗神社]]。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 捐款箱

property.name: description
property.value: On the Nintendo Switch version of [[Undertale]], the door at the back of the [[Dog Shrine]] unlocks after defeating [[Mettaton EX]]. It can be opened by tilting both control sticks in opposite directions.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 僅出現在 [[版本差異|Nintendo Switch 版本]]的 ''[[Undertale]]'' 中，主角可以與[[憤怒喵喵]]戰鬥。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 上鎖的門

property.name: description
property.value: On the Xbox versions of [[Undertale]], the protagonist can win specialized currency in the [[Dog Shrine]]'s casino, with which they can use to buy items for the shrine.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 僅出現在 [[版本差異|Xbox 版本]]的 ''[[Undertale]]'' 中，主角可以下注來升級[[狗狗神社|狗狗賭場]]。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 捐款箱

property.name: description
property.value: The protagonist is given a key to [[Sans]]'s room ater repeatedly reloading a [[SAVE]] and going through Sans's judgement in the [[Last Corridor]] if they had gained no [[Stats#EXP|EXP]].

property.name: page
property.value: Papyrus and Sans's House#Sans's Room

properties.property: 如果主角在[[最後迴廊]]中經歷 [[Sans]] 的審判時未獲得任何 [[遊戲數據#EXP|EXP]]，並且反覆重新載入[[存檔]]，就會獲得一把前往 Sans 房間的鑰匙。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: Sans 的房間

property.name: zh_page
property.value: Papyrus 和 Sans 的家#Sans 的房間

property.name: description
property.value: Unlocked after using the [[Silver Key]] on the doot in the back of [[Papyrus and Sans's House]].

property.name: page
property.value: Papyrus and Sans's House#Sans's Workshop

properties.property: 使用[[銀色鑰匙]]打開[[Papyrus 和 Sans 的家]]後方的門即可解鎖。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: Sans 的工作室

property.name: zh_page
property.value: Papyrus 和 Sans 的家#Sans 的工作室

property.name: description
property.value: Sells [[Nice Cream]] for 15G. The Nice Cream Guy does not show up on the [[Genocide Route]] and disappears after exhausting Snowdin's kill counter on the [[Neutral Route]].

property.name: page
property.value: Nice Cream Guy

properties.property: 以15G 的價格販售[[好棒冰]]。 在[[屠殺路線]]中或是[[雪町]]的擊殺計數達到上限時不會出現。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 好棒冰店員

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 好棒冰店員

property.name: description
property.value: The protagonist can buy items from the shop.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin Shopkeeper

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 主角可以在此購買物品。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 雪町店長

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町店長

property.name: description
property.value: A Dimensional Box in Sonwdin's Box Road.

property.name: page
property.value: Dimensional Box

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 出現在箱子之路的次元箱。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 次元箱

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 次元箱

property.name: description
property.value: A Dimensional Box in Snowdin Town.

property.name: page
property.value: Dimensional Box

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 出現在雪町鎮的次元箱。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 次元箱

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 次元箱

property.name: description
property.value: The protagonist must navigate the maze and avoid touching the invisible walls, upon which they get shocked by the orb they are holding. [[Papyrus]] unknowingly traces the correct path on the ground, which the protagonist can use to walk across.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/Puzzles#The Invisible Electricity Maze

properties.property: 主角必須穿越迷宮並避免碰觸隱形牆壁，否則會被球體電到。但是 [[Papyrus]] 在不知情的情況下在地上畫出正確的路線，主角可以依此路徑通過迷宮。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 隱形電擊迷宮

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/謎題#隱形電擊迷宮

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 隱形電擊迷宮路線

property.name: description
property.value: The protagonist must guide the snowball at the top of the course to this hole before the snowball disappears. Once the ball makes it into the hole, a flag pops out, its color changing depending on how long it took to get the ball into the hole. The protagonist also receives some [[GOLD]].

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/Puzzles#Ball Game

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 主角必須在雪球消失之前，將雪球如同高爾夫般推入洞中。一旦雪球進洞，會有一面旗子冒出來，其顏色會根據將雪球送入洞中的時間而變化。主角也會獲得一些[[金錢]]。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 推雪球遊戲

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/謎題#推雪球遊戲

property.name: description
property.value: A word search that [[Sans]] had placed for the protagonist, containing a drawing of Ice-E. If the [[Fun Value]] is between 56 and 57, an additional drawing of a snowman named "Nightmare" appears on the word search.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/Puzzles#Monster Kidz Word Search

properties.property: 這是一個 [[Sans]] 為主角準備的單字搜尋遊戲，裡面包含了一幅 Ice-E 的插圖。 若 [[Fun 值]]介於56~57之間，還會額外出現一幅名為"惡夢(Nightmare)"的雪人插圖。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 怪物兒童單詞搜索

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/謎題#怪物兒童單詞搜索

property.name: description
property.value: The protagonist must press the switch hidden under this patch of snow to unlock the way forward. On the [[Genocide Route]], the puzzle will have already been solved by the time the protagonist reaches this point.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/Puzzles#The Snow Puzz;le

properties.property: 主角必須按下藏在這片雪地下的開關，才能解鎖前方的道路。 在[[屠殺路線]]中已被解開。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 雪地謎題

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/謎題#雪地謎題

property.name: description
property.value: The protagonist must step on each X panels to turn them into O panels, then press the switch to unlock the way forward. On the [[Genocide Route]], this puzzle is already solved.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/Puzzles#The XOXO Puzzles

properties.property: 主角必須踩在每個 X 面板上將其變為 O 面板，然後按下開關以解鎖前方的道路。 在[[屠殺路線]]中已被解開。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: XOXO 謎題 #1

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/謎題#XOXO 謎題

property.name: description
property.value: A map of the snow puzzle depicting the entire room. An "X" in the top-right marks where the switch is situated.

properties.property: 一張描繪整個區域雪地謎題的地圖。右上角的"X"標示了開關的位置。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 雪地謎題地圖

property.name: description
property.value: A puzzle shaped like [[Papyrus]]'s face. The protagonist can either solve the puzzle manually or press the switch hidden in the tree to immediately disable it. On the [[Genocide Route]], the puzzle is already solved.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/Puzzles#The XOXO Puzzles

properties.property: 類似 [[Papyrus]] 臉的謎題。主角必須踩在每個 X 面板上將其變為 O 面板，然後按下開關以解鎖前方的道路。 在[[屠殺路線]]中已被解開。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: XOXO 謎題 #2

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/謎題#XOXO 謎題

property.name: description
property.value: A switch hidden in the tree. Pressing it and stepping on the switch in front of the puzzle immediately disables it.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 藏在樹裡的開關。按下它並踩在謎題前方的開關上後，謎題會立即被解除。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: XOXO 快速解決

property.name: description
property.value: The protagonist must navigate across the puzzle through the walkable tiles. When [[Papyrus]] activates this puzzle, the solution is aways the same, allowing the protagonist to walk across without issue.

property.name: page
property.value: Multicolor Tile Puzzle

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 主角必須沿著可行走的地板穿越這個謎題。當 [[Papyrus]] 啟動此謎題時，解法始終相同，使主角能輕鬆走過而不會遇到問題。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 彩色磚塊謎題

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 彩色磚塊謎題

property.name: zh_name
property.value: XOXO 謎題 #2 路徑

property.name: description
property.value: The protagonist must solve this puzzle in order to extend the bridge and progress forward.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/Puzzles#The XOXO Puzzles

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 主角必須解開這個謎題才能延伸橋樑，繼續前進。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: XOXO 謎題 #3

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/謎題#XOXO 謎題

property.name: description
property.value: The protagonist lands here if they fall off the edge of the room. They are taken back to the start.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 如果主角從房間邊緣跌落，會掉到這個地方。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: XOXO 謎題 #3 (失敗區域)

property.name: zh_name
property.value: XOXO 謎題 #3 路徑

property.name: description
property.value: ''The convenience of that lamp still fills you with determination.''

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 那盞燈的便利使你依舊充滿了決心。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 雪町 - 箱子通路

properties.property: Knowing the mouse might one day find a way to heat up the spaghetti... It fills you with determination.
知道老鼠總有一天會找到加熱義大利麵的方法...... 這使你充滿了決心。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 雪町 - 義大利麵

properties.property:
'''Spared [[Lesser Dog]]:''' ''Knowing the dog will never give up trying to make the perfect snowdog...'' ''It fills you with determination.''
'''Killed Lesser Dog:''' ''Snow can always be broken down and rebuilt into something more useful.'' ''This simple fact fills you with determination.''

想著狗狗總有一天會做出完美的雪犬， 使你充滿了決心。 '''[寬恕 Lesser Dog]'''
雪總是能夠打掉、重新做成其他更加有用的東西。 這簡單的道理使你充滿了決心。 '''[殺掉 Lesser Dog]'''

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 雪町 - 狗屋

property.name: description
property.value: ''The sight of such a friendly town fills you with determination.''

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 眼前如此友善的城鎮使你充滿了決心。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 雪町 - 城鎮

property.name: description
property.value: After [[Papyrus]]'s introduction, the protagonist can talk to [[Sans]]. He warns them that Papyrus may come back if they linger, but on the [[Genocide Route]], he only comments that the protagonist is staring at him.

properties.property: 在 [[Papyrus]] 登場之後，主角可以與 [[Sans]] 對話。他會提醒主角，如果待太久，Papyrus 可能會回來。 在[[屠殺路線]]中，他會評論主角為何一直盯著他看。

property.name: description
property.value: The [[Snowdin/NPCs#Ugly Fish|Ugly Fish]]'s fishing rod. Reeling it in reveals a note that says ''Call me! Here's my number!''

properties.property: [[雪町/NPC#Ugly Fish|Ugly Fish]] 的釣魚竿。將釣線拉起會看到一張字條，上面寫著"打給我！這是我的電話號碼！"

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 釣竿

property.name: description
property.value: Snowdrake appears here after defeating [[Papyrus]] if no monsters have been killed. He reveals why he ran away from home.

properties.property: 若在擊敗 [[Papyrus]] 後沒有殺死任何怪物，Snowdrake 會在此出現。他會透露自己為何離家出走。

property.name: description
property.value: After completing the [[True Pacifist Route]], Snowdrake's Mother appears here, having reunited with her son and husband.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdrake's Mother

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 在[[完美路線]]結尾出現在這裡，並已與她的兒子和丈夫團聚。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: Snowdrake's Mother

property.name: description
property.value: After completing the [[True Pacifist Route]]. Snowdrake's Father appears here, having reunited with his wife and son.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdrake's Father

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 在[[完美路線]]結尾出現在這裡，並已與她的兒子和母親團聚。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: MTT 度假村#Snowdrake's Father

property.name: description
property.value: [[Sans]] teaches the protagonist about [[Attack Types#Light Blue Attack|blue attacks]].

property.name: zh_description
property.value: [[Sans]]教導主角關於[[攻擊種類#水色攻擊|水色攻擊]]的知識。

property.name: description
property.value: The snowman offers a [[Snowman Piece]] to the protagonist and requests that they take it "to the ends of the earth." On the [[Genocide Route]], the protagonist can forcibly take up to three Snowman Pieces at once.

properties.property: 雪人會將一塊[[雪人碎片]]交給主角，並請求他們將它"帶到天涯海角"。 在[[屠殺路線]]中主角可以強行一次拿走最多三塊雪人碎片。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/NPC#Snowman

property.name: description
property.value: [[Sans]] tells the protagonist about [[Papyrus]]'s clothing, which he calls his "battle body."

property.name: zh_description
property.value: [[Sans]] 告訴主角關於 [[Papyrus]] 服裝的事，並稱那是他的"戰鬥服"。

property.name: description
property.value: A [[Chilldrake]] appears here after defeating [[Papyrus]] and no monsters have been killed. They proudly claim that they and their peers rule the forest with a "smaller-than adult fist."

properties.property: 若在擊敗 [[Papyrus]] 後未殺死任何怪物，這裡會出現一隻 [[Chilldrake]]。他會自豪地宣稱自己和夥伴們以"比大人拳頭還小的拳頭"統治這片森林。

property.name: description
property.value: [[Sans]] pretends to sell "fried snow" at increasingly expensive prices. He then claims to not have any snow.

properties.property: [[Sans]] 假裝販售"炸雪"，價格越來越昂貴。最後他表示自己根本沒有雪。

property.name: description
property.value: [[Sans]] tells the protagonist that [[Papyrus]] had difficulty attempting to "solve" a horoscope.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: [[Sans]] 告訴主角 [[Papyrus]] 曾經努力想要"解開"一個星座運勢。

property.name: description
property.value: An [[Ice Cap]] appears after defeating [[Papyrus]] if no monsters have been killed. They bring attention to their hat and ask the protagonist to think about it.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 若在擊敗 [[Papyrus]] 後沒有殺死任何怪物，會出現一隻 [[Ice Cap]]。他會特別提到自己的帽子，並請主角好好想想它。

property.name: description
property.value: [[Papyrus]] tells the protagonist about [[Sans]]'s sock collection and wonders aloud what Sans would do without him taking care of him.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: [[Papyrus]] 告訴主角有關 [[Sans]] 的襪子收藏，並喃喃自語地想著如果沒有他照顧，Sans 會變成什麼樣子。

property.name: description
property.value: A [[Chilldrake]] appears here after defeating [[Papyrus]] if no monsters have been kiled. They mention how the rebellious teenagers have to share their lunch with [[Snowdrake]] since he ran away from home.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 若在擊敗 [[Papyrus]] 後沒有殺死任何怪物，這裡會出現一隻 [[Chilldrake]]。他會提到那些叛逆的青少年必須和 [[Snowdrake]] 分享午餐，因為他離家出走。

property.name: description
property.value: [[Sans]] tells the protagonist that they could have asked him for help with the puzzle.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: [[Sans]] 告訴主角本來可以請他幫忙解這個謎題。

property.name: description
property.value: An [[Ice Cap]] appears here after defeating [[Papyrus]] of no monsters have been killed. They express their desre to wear different clothing from their peers.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 若在擊敗 [[Papyrus]] 後沒有殺死任何怪物，這裡會出現一隻 [[Ice Cap]]。他表達了自己想穿與其他同伴不一樣的衣服的願望。

property.name: description
property.value: Gyftrot appears here after defeating [[Papyrus]] if no monsters have been killed. They acknoledge the tradition based on how they are always being decorated.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 若在擊敗 [[Papyrus]] 後沒有殺死任何怪物，這裡會出現一隻 Gyftrot。牠會提到自己總是被裝飾，並認可這已成為一種傳統。

property.name: description
property.value: An [[Ice Cap]] appears here after defeating [[Papyrus]] if no monsters have been killed. They lament that no one is around to pay attention to them since they live in the woods.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 若在擊敗 [[Papyrus]] 後沒有殺死任何怪物，這裡會出現一隻 [[Ice Cap]]。他感嘆自己住在森林裡，沒有人在意牠的存在。

property.name: description
property.value: [[Sans]] greets the protagonist.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: [[Sans]] 向主角打招呼。

property.name: description
property.value: [[Sans]] appears here once he is no longer visible from the right. He accuses the protagonist of following them.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: [[Sans]] 在從右側看不到後出現。他指責主角一直在跟蹤他。

property.name: description
property.value: A sleeping dog. The protagonist is given the option to "fight" the dog, but no fight takes place regardless of their choice.

property.name: page
property.value: Annoying Dog

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 一隻正在睡覺的狗。雖然主角會被給予"戰鬥"這隻狗的選項，但無論選擇與否，都不會發生戰鬥。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 煩人的狗

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 煩人的狗

property.name: description
property.value: [[Sans]] comments on [[Papyrus]]'s cooking and states the possibility that he could make something edible one day,

property.name: zh_description
property.value: [[Sans]] 評論了 [[Papyrus]] 的廚藝，並表示有一天他或許真的能做出可以吃的東西。

property.name: description
property.value: [[Sans]] warns the protagonist of [[Papyrus]]'s blue attacks. On the [[Genocide Route]], he warns them of a "bad time" before teleporting away.

properties.property: [[Sans]] 警告主角注意 [[Papyrus]] 的藍色攻擊。 在[[屠殺路線]]中則警告主角將會有個"壞時光"，隨後立刻瞬間移動消失。

property.name: description
property.value: Child of the Innkeeper. They explain the functionalities of the inn. On the [[Genocide Route]], the child is replaced with an identical-looking decoy.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/NPCs#Innkeeper's Child

properties.property: 旅館老闆的孩子。他會說明旅館的功能。 在[[屠殺路線]]中被一個誘餌取代。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/NPC#Inn Keepers

property.name: description
property.value: A rabbit NPC who is disturbed by the [[Snowdin/NPCs#Rabbit Girl and Cinnamon|Rabbit Girl]]'s mannerisms.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/NPCs#Rabbit Kid

properties.property: 一位對[[雪町/NPC#Rabbit Girl and Cinnamon|Rabbit Girl]]的舉止感到困擾的兔子。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/NPC#Rabbit Kid

property.name: description
property.value: The Rabbit Girl is seen walking her little brother Cinnamon on a leash, oblivious to the [[Snowdin/NPCs#Rabbit Kid|Rabbit Kid]] staring at her.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/NPCs#Rabbit Girl and Cinnamon

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 她正用牽繩牽著她的弟弟散步。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/NPC#Rabbit Girl and Cinnamon

property.name: description
property.value: Explains the gift-giving tradition based on [[Gyftrot]]'s situation.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/NPCs#Gift Bear

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 說明了基於 [[Gyftrot]] 情況而產生的送禮傳統。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/NPC#Gift Bear

property.name: description
property.value: Recognizes the protagonist as a fellow kid based on their striped shirt. They are still present on the [[Genocide Route]], explaining that everyone had evacuated.

property.name: page
property.value: Monster Kid

properties.property: 根據主角身上的條紋衣服，認出他也是個小孩。 在[[屠殺路線]]中他則覺得很好奇為何大家要撤離。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 怪物小孩

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 怪物小孩

property.name: description
property.value: Explains how Snowdin's political system is based on [[Papyrus]] usually reporting directly to [[Undyne]].

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/NPCs#Politics Bear

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 解釋了雪町的政治體系是建立在 [[Papyrus]] 向 [[Undyne]] 報告的基礎上。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/NPC#Politics Bear

property.name: description
property.value: Warns the protagonist about [[Greater Dog]]'s affectionate behavior.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 警告主角要注意 [[Greater Dog]] 那過於親暱的行為。

property.name: description
property.value: Laments that the sentries do not gain any respect and wishes [[Sans]] or [[Papyrus]] would give them a bone.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 感嘆哨兵們得不到任何尊重，並希望 [[Sans]] 或 [[Papyrus]] 能給他們一根骨頭。

property.name: description
property.value: Considers getting a collar to express his desire to be taken for a walk.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 考慮要不要戴上項圈，以表達他想被帶去散步的願望。

property.name: description
property.value: Makes a single sound effect.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 發出奇怪的聲音。

property.name: description
property.value: Is in the middle of a game of poker against itself.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 他和自己玩撲克牌。

property.name: description
property.value: Explains that they are literally fishing for a date with a girl.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/NPCs#Ugly Fish

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 解釋他釣魚的目的是想釣到一位女孩約會。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/NPC#Ugly Fish

property.name: description
property.value: Explains the [[Royal Guard]] to the protagonist. She usually acts as a translator for [[Grillby]].

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/NPCs#Red Bird

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 向主角解釋 [[Royal Guards]] 的相關資訊。她通常也擔任 [[雪町/NPC#Grillby|Grillby]] 的翻譯。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/NPC#Red Bird

property.name: description
property.value: The bartender and owner of the restaurant. He is usually silent and only speaks a single line at the end of the [[True Pacifist Route]].

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 酒吧老闆。他通常保持沉默，僅在[[完美路線]]結尾時說出唯一的一句話。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町#NPC/Grillby

property.name: description
property.value: Explains the overcrowding situation and [[New Home]]. He fears the erasure of Snowdin's local culture if people from the capital start moving.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/NPCs#Punk Hamster

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 解釋了擁擠的狀況以及[[新居|首都]]的情形。他擔心如果首都的人開始搬過來，雪町的在地文化將會被抹去。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/NPC#Punk Hamster

property.name: description
property.value: Explains the differences between monster food and human food and expresses desire to try some.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/NPCs#Big Mouth

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 解釋了怪物食物與人類食物之間的差異，並表示想嘗試看看人類的食物。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/NPC#Big Mouth

property.name: description
property.value: Expresses desire for new drinks and "hot guys."

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/NPCs#Drunk Bun

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 表達了對新飲品和"帥哥"的渴望。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/NPC#Drunk Bun

property.name: description
property.value: Complains that people are making light of the depressing situation in the [[Underground]].

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/NPCs#Scarf Mouse

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 抱怨大家對[[地下世界]]的悲慘處境輕描淡寫不當一回事。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/NPC#Scarf Mouse

property.name: description
property.value: Explains that people make light of the depressing situation in the [[Underground]] because they cannot do anything aout it.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/NPCs#Red Demon

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 解釋說人們之所以對[[地下世界]]的悲慘處境輕描淡寫，是因為他們無能為力、無法改變現狀。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/NPC#Red Demon

property.name: description
property.value: A father of two slime children. Reminisces about his younger days.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/NPCs#Slime Family

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 兩個史萊姆孩子的父親。回憶著自己年輕時的日子。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/NPC#Slime Family

property.name: description
property.value: Two children playing a game of "Monsters and Humans." They are sent inside by their father if either [[Papyrus]] or the [[Royal Guard|Snowdin Canine Unit]] are killed.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/NPCs#Slime Family

properties.property: 兩個孩子正在玩"怪物與人類"的遊戲。 若 [[Papyrus]] 或任一[[皇家衛隊]]成員被殺，他們的父親會把他們叫回屋裡。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/NPC#Slime Family

property.name: description
property.value: Express joy at hearing the protagonist knock on their door.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/NPCs#Knock Lover

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 聽到主角敲門時感到非常高興。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/NPC#Knock Lover

property.name: description
property.value: Is seen throwing ice into the water, which eventually travels to the [[CORE]]. Can be spoken to directly at the end of the [[True Pacifist Route]], where they express desire to buy a new pair of pants.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/NPCs#Ice Wolf

properties.property: 可以看到他把冰塊丟進水裡，這些冰塊最終會流向[[核心]]。 在[[完美路線]]結尾時可以直接與他對話，他表示自己想買一條新褲子。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/NPC#Ice Wolf

property.name: description
property.value: Ferries the protagonist to either [[Waterfall]] or [[Hotland]].

property.name: page
property.value: River Person

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 主角可以到[[瀑布]]或[[熱地]]。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 河流人

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 河流人

property.name: description
property.value: Snowdin's librarian. They acknoledge the misspelled sign outside the library.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/NPCs#Library Lizard

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 雪町的圖書館員。她表示圖書館外的招牌拼錯了字。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/NPC#Library Lizard

property.name: description
property.value: A monster resembling a [[Loox]]. They note the protagonist's difficulty solving either crosswords or Junior Jumble.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/NPCs#Library Loox

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 一隻外型類似 [[Loox]] 的怪物。他指出主角在解開"填字遊戲"或"縱恆字謎"上的困難。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/NPC#Library Loox

property.name: description
property.value: Explains that she usually fills the newspaper with comics and games due to lack of news to report.

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/NPCs#Newspaper Editors

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 解釋說因為沒有什麼新聞可報，她通常會用漫畫和遊戲填滿報紙。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/NPC#Newspaper Editors

property.name: description
property.value: Claims to be the number-one word-search creator in the [[Underground]].

property.name: page
property.value: Snowdin/NPCs#Newspaper Editors

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 她自稱是[[地下世界]]裡排名第一的單字搜尋遊戲創作者。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/NPC#Newspaper Editors

property.name: description
property.value: [[Doggo]] relocates here at the end of the [[True Pacifist Route]]. He is happy that he has a constantly moving family member.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 在[[完美路線]]結尾中出現。他很高興自己有一位會不停移動的家人。

property.name: description
property.value: [[Dogamy and Dogaressa|Dogaressa]] relocates here at the end of the [[True Pacifist Route]], having reunited with her amalgamated family members.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 在[[完美路線]]結尾中出現。她很高興家人能夠團聚。

property.name: description
property.value: [[Greater Dog]] relocates here at the end of the [[True Pacifist Route]], having reunited with its amalgamated family members.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 在[[完美路線]]結尾中出現。他發出奇怪的聲音。

property.name: description
property.value: Relocates here at the end of the [[True Pacifist Route]], having reunited with its family members.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 在[[完美路線]]結尾中出現。他發出奇怪的聲音。

property.name: description
property.value: [[Dogamy and Dogaressa|Dogamy]] relocates here at the end of the [[True Pacifist Route]], having reunited with his amalgamated family members. He wonders if he would be considered to be married to his sister due to their parents having amalgaated into the same entity.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 在[[完美路線]]結尾中出現。他疑惑由於父母融合成了同一個個體，這是否意味著他和自己的姊姊算是結婚了。

property.name: description
property.value: Undyne relocates here after befriending her. On the [[True Pacifist Route]], she gives [[Undyne's Letter|a letter]] to the protagonist and asks them to deliver it to [[Alphys]] on her behalf.

properties.property: 在與 Undyne 成為朋友後出現在這。 在[[完美路線]]中她會將[[Undyne 的信|一封信]]交給主角，請代為轉交給 [[Alphys]]。

property.name: description
property.value: [[Papyrus]] guides the protagonist to [[Papyrus and Sans's House|his house]] and unlocks the door.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: [[Papyrus]] 帶領主角前往[[Papyrus 和 Sans 的家|他的家]]並解鎖大門。

property.name: description
property.value: [[Papyrus]] welcomes the protagonist to his house and acts as a host.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: [[Papyrus]] 歡迎主角來到他的家，並擔任主人的角色招待對方。

property.name: description
property.value: [[Sans]] provides commentary on the items in the room. After defeating [[Mettaton EX]], he is replaced with [[Mad Mew Mew]].

properties.property: [[Sans]] 會對房間內的物品發表評論。 在擊敗 [[Mettaton EX]] 之後被[[憤怒喵喵]]取代。

property.name: description
property.value: Provides commentary on [[Lesser Dog]]'s attempts to build a snowdog.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 對 [[Lesser Dog]] 的創作發表評論。

property.name: zh_page
property.value: 雪町/NPC#Faun

properties.property: This is a [[Dimensional Box|box]]. You can put an item inside or take an item out. The same box will appear later, so don't worry about coming back. Sincerely, a box lover.
即便是不同的[[次元箱|箱子]]， 你依然可以把東西隨意地拿進拿出 ...相同的箱子將在後面出現，所以不需要特別回來。 您誠摯的 愛箱者。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 告示牌

properties.property: YOU OBSERVE THE WELL-CRAFTED SENTRY STATION. WHO COULD HAVE BUILT THIS, YOU PONDER... I BET IT WAS THAT VERY FAMOUS ROYAL GUARDSMAN! (NOTE: NOT YET A VERY FAMOUS ROYAL GUARDSMAN.)
'''你檢查了這個非常英俊的哨站。''' '''你思考著，是誰建造這個哨站。''' '''我敢打賭一定是那個非常有名的皇家衛隊成員！''' ('''附註: 尚未成為非常有名的有名的皇家衛隊成員。''')

property.name: zh_name
property.value: Papyrus 的哨站提示

property.name: description
property.value: ''Absolutely NO MOVING!!!''

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 絕對不要動！！！

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 告示牌

properties.property: North: Ice South: Ice West: Ice East: [[Snowdin|Snowdin Town]] (... and ice)
北方：冰 南方：冰 西方：冰 東方：[[雪町鎮]] (... 還有冰)

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 告示牌

properties.property:
SMELL DANGER RATING
Snow Smell - Snowman White Rating Can become YELLOW Rating
Unsuspicious Smell - Puppy BLUE Rating Smell of rolling around.
Weird Smell - Humans GREEN Rating Destroy at all costs!

危險氣味分類
雪的氣味 - 雪人 白色等級 可變為黃色等級
無可疑氣味 - 小狗 藍色等級 翻滾過後的氣味。
奇怪氣味 - 人類 綠色等級 不惜一切代價消滅！

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 告示牌

properties.property:
HUMAN!! PLEASE ENJOY THIS SPAGHETTI. (LITTLE DO YOU KNOW, THIS SPAGHETTI IS A TRAP...) (DESIGNED TO ENTICE YOU!!!) (YOU'LL BE SO BUSY EATING IT...) (THAT YOU WON'T REALIZE THAT YOU AREN'T PROGRESSING!!) (THOROUGHLY JAPED AGAIN BY THE GREAT PAPYRUS!!!)
NYEH HEH HEH, PAPYRUS
人類！！請享用這份義大利麵。 (你不知道的是，這份義大利麵是一個陷阱...) (設計來吸引你的！！！) (你會忙著吃它...) (以致於你不會發現自己沒有前進！！) (又一次被偉大的 PAPYRUS 徹底戲弄了！！！) 捏嘿嘿，PAPYRUS

property.name: zh_name
property.value: Papyrus 的筆記

properties.property: Warning: Dog Marriage (Yes, you read that correctly.)
警告：狗狗結婚 (沒錯，你沒有讀錯。)

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 告示牌

property.name: description
property.value: ''Turn every X into an O. Then press the switch.''

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 將 X 變成 O。然後按下開關。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 告示牌

property.name: description
property.value: ''Turn every X into an O. Then press the switch.''

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 將 X 變成 O。然後按下開關。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 告示牌

properties.property: AWARE OF DOG pleas pet dog
注意狗狗 請摸狗狗

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 告示牌

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 汪

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 告示牌

properties.property: Don't want to walk to the other side of town? Try the undersnow tunnels. They're efficiently laid out.
不想走到小鎮的另一頭嗎？ 試試看雪下隧道吧。它們的配置非常高效。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 告示牌

property.name: description
property.value: ''the truth is that you got owned, nerd......''

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 真相就是你被耍了，傻子...

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 跑步機上的紙條

properties.property:
'''First time:''' SORRY, I HAVE TO LOCK YOU IN THE GUEST ROOM UNTIL [[Undyne|UNDYNE]] ARRIVES. FEEL FREE TO MAKE YOURSELF AT HOME!!! REFRESHMENTS AND ACCOMODATIONS HAVE BEEN PROVIDED. - NYEHFULLY YOURS, PAPYRUS
'''Second time:''' PLEASE ASK BEFORE YOU ESCAPE!!! WHEN YOU WENT MISSING, I GOT WORRIED SICK!!! - SLIGHTLY BONETROUSLED, PAPYRUS
'''Third time onward:''' IF YOU'RE JUST LOOKING FOR A PLACE TO STAY... JUST ASK!!! YOU DON'T NEED TO FIGHT ME!!! - YOUR HOST, PAPYRUS

抱歉，我得把你關在客房裡，直到 UNDYNE 到來。把這當作自己家！！！已提供了茶點與憩所 - 你所需的一切，PAPYRUS 上。 '''[第一次]'''
請在你要逃出去前問一下！！！當你失蹤時我擔心死了！！！- 有點骨噪，PAPYRUS 上。 '''[第二次]'''
如果你只是想找個地方待著...問一下就好了！！！你不需要和我戰鬥！！！- 你的主人，PAPYRUS 上。'''[第三次]'''

property.name: zh_name
property.value: Papyrus 的筆記

properties.property: [[Monsters|Monster]] funerals, technically speaking, are cool as heck. When monsters get old and kick the bucket, they turn into dust. At funerals, we take that dust and spread it on that person's favorite thing. Then their essence will live on in that thing... Uhhh, am I at the page minimum yet? I'm kinda sick of writing this.
[[怪物]]的葬禮，技術上來說，超酷的。 當怪物年老並咽氣時，他們會變成塵埃。 在葬禮上，我們會把那些塵埃撒在那個人最喜愛的東西上。 這樣，他們的本質就會留存在那個東西裡... 呃，我頁數夠了嗎？我有點寫膩了。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 關於怪物葬禮的學校報告

properties.property: While [[monsters]] are mostly made of magic, [[Humans|human]] beings are mostly made of water. Humans, with their physical forms, are far stronger than us. But they will never know the joy of expressing themselves through magic. They will never get a bullet-pattern birthday card...
雖然[[怪物]]大多由魔法構成，[[人類]]則主要由水構成。 人類擁有實體，因此比我們強壯得多。 但他們永遠無法體會用魔法表達自我的樂趣。 他們永遠也收不到彈幕圖案的生日卡片...

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 關於魔法的書

properties.property:
Here I am... Writing this book. A person comes in and picks up the book... They start reading it...!
'''Scarf Lady:''' "Oh, sorry. I'm still writing that one."

我在這裡...寫著這本書。 一個人走進來，拿起書... 他開始閱讀...！
'''Scarf Lady：'''"啊，抱歉。那本還沒寫完呢。"

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 未完成的書

properties.property: Because they are made of magic, [[monsters]]' bodies are attuned to their [[SOUL]]. If a monster doesn't want to fight, its defenses will weaken. And the crueller the intentions of our enemies, the more their attacks will hurt us. Therefore, if a being with a powerful SOUL struck with the desire to kill... Um, let's end the chapter here.
由於怪物是由魔法構成的，他們的身體與他們的[[靈魂]]緊密相連。 如果一個怪物不想戰鬥，他的防禦力就會變弱。 而敵人的意圖越殘忍，他們的攻擊對我們造成的傷害就越大。 因此，如果一個擁有強大靈魂的存在懷著殺意出手的話... 嗯，我們就先在這裡結束這一章吧。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 關於攻擊的書

properties.property: Fearing the [[humans]] no longer, we moved out of our old city, [[Home|HOME]]. We braved harsh cold, [[Waterfall|damp swampland]], and [[Hotland|searing heat]]... Until we reached what we now call our capital. "[[New Home|NEW HOME]]." Again, our [[Asgore Dreemurr|King]] is really bad at names...?
對人類的不斷恐懼後， 我們搬離了從前的城市，那個"[[居所]]"。 我們越過[[雪町|嚴寒]]，[[瀑布|潮濕沼澤]]，和[[熱地|熾熱]]... 直到我們到達所說的新領地， "[[新居]]"。 我們的[[Asgore Dreemurr|國王]]真的很不擅長取名字...？

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 怪物歷史第四章

properties.property: Love, hope, compassion... This is what people say monster [[SOUL]]s are made of. But the absolute nature of the "SOUL" is unknown. After all, [[humans]] have proven their SOULs don't need these things to exist.
愛、希望、仁慈...這些是人們所說怪物的[[靈魂]]所構成的元素。 但"靈魂"的真正本質仍是未知數。 畢竟，[[人類]]已經證明了他們的靈魂不需要這些東西也能存在。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 關於靈魂的書

property.name: description
property.value: 30 [[GOLD]] can be obtained from any snow poff after interacting with all previous snow poffs.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 與所有先前的雪堆互動後，任一雪堆中可以獲得 30G。

property.value: 金錢
